entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 20.
